How will a
website audit help me?

If I asked you, “I’ll check your car for free, today, and let you know if there’s anything wrong with it.” Would you turn me down?

I wouldn’t.

But that’s because I don’t know much about cars, including the consequences of not catching an issue soon enough. So if you’re interested in catching issues with your website before they cost you, there’s a quick, 5 question form at the bottom of this page.

How are your website audits better?

You can understand them

I break my findings down into a simple, jargon-less report with actionable tasks that will tell you how to improve your website.

You'll receive your audit within 24 hours

Tired of reaching out for help, only to hear back a month later? That's not helpful. Let's get you and your business on the right track. today

They're free

I don't charge for a website audit! Knowledge is power, and I'm here to empower you and your business.

Can I do a website audit myself?

Of course! In fact, if you’re using Google Chrome as your browser, there’s a built-in auditing tool called Lighthouse you can use. The results may be a tad confusing, but this post of mine can help your translate.

If you’re interested in doing an audit yourself, take my Website Auditing Playbook with you (it’s also free).

How much does an audit cost?
